about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Which of the following is most likely to be slippery in cold weather after snow or rain?

about.name: Which of the following is most likely to be slippery in cold weather after snow or rain?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following is most likely to be slippery in cold weather after snow or rain? | Which of the following is most likely to be slippery in cold weather after snow or rain? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: On cold, wet days, shaded spots on a roadway can become icy. Shaded areas often freeze before, and thaw out after, the rest of a road.

comment.text: A hilly, open road
A residential road

suggestedAnswer.text: A road in a shaded area

comment.text: A road in a shaded area

acceptedAnswer.text: A road in a shaded area

comment.text: A road in a shaded area

answerExplanation.text: On cold, wet days, shaded spots on a roadway can become icy. Shaded areas often freeze before, and thaw out after, the rest of a road.

comment.text: Which of the following is most likely to be slippery in cold weather after snow or rain? | On cold, wet days, shaded spots on a roadway can become icy. Shaded areas often freeze before, and thaw out after, the rest of a road.

hasPart.name: A school bus is stopped ahead of you in your lane with its red lights flashing. You should:

about.name: A school bus is stopped ahead of you in your lane with its red lights flashing. You should:

hasPart.assesses: A school bus is stopped ahead of you in your lane with its red lights flashing. You should: | A school bus is stopped ahead of you in your lane with its red lights flashing. You should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When a stopped school bus is using its flashing red lights, approaching drivers must stop and remain stopped until the lights stop flashing. If the school bus is on the opposite side of a divided highway, drivers do not need to stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop and proceed when you think all of the children have exited the bus.

comment.text: Stop and proceed when you think all of the children have exited the bus.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow to 25 mph and pass cautiously.

comment.text: Slow to 25 mph and pass cautiously.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop for as long as the red lights are flashing.

comment.text: Stop for as long as the red lights are flashing.

acceptedAnswer.text: Stop for as long as the red lights are flashing.

comment.text: Stop for as long as the red lights are flashing.

answerExplanation.text: When a stopped school bus is using its flashing red lights, approaching drivers must stop and remain stopped until the lights stop flashing. If the school bus is on the opposite side of a divided highway, drivers do not need to stop.

comment.text: A school bus is stopped ahead of you in your lane with its red lights flashing. You should: | When a stopped school bus is using its flashing red lights, approaching drivers must stop and remain stopped until the lights stop flashing. If the school bus is on the opposite side of a divided highway, drivers do not need to stop.

hasPart.name: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do?

about.name: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do?

hasPart.assesses: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do? | A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You must obey any traffic direction, order, or signal given by a traffic officer, peace officer, or firefighter, even if it conflicts with existing signs, signals, or laws.

suggestedAnswer.text: Do as the officer tells you.

comment.text: Do as the officer tells you.
Wait for the green light.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop first, then do what the officer tells you.

comment.text: Stop first, then do what the officer tells you.

acceptedAnswer.text: Do as the officer tells you.

comment.text: Do as the officer tells you.

answerExplanation.text: You must obey any traffic direction, order, or signal given by a traffic officer, peace officer, or firefighter, even if it conflicts with existing signs, signals, or laws.

hasPart.name: Before you change lanes, you should check your mirrors and:

about.name: Before you change lanes, you should check your mirrors and:

hasPart.assesses: Before you change lanes, you should check your mirrors and: | Before you change lanes, you should check your mirrors and: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Before changing lanes, it is very important to check behind you. You should look over your shoulder to ensure that you are not getting in the way of vehicles in the lane you want to enter. Before changing lanes, you should also ensure that no drivers are attempting to drive into the same spot from a different lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Never look over your right shoulder.

comment.text: Never look over your right shoulder.

suggestedAnswer.text: Always slow down in your traffic lane.

comment.text: Always slow down in your traffic lane.
Glance over your shoulder.
Glance over your shoulder.

answerExplanation.text: Before changing lanes, it is very important to check behind you. You should look over your shoulder to ensure that you are not getting in the way of vehicles in the lane you want to enter. Before changing lanes, you should also ensure that no drivers are attempting to drive into the same spot from a different lane.

comment.text: Before you change lanes, you should check your mirrors and: | Before changing lanes, it is very important to check behind you. You should look over your shoulder to ensure that you are not getting in the way of vehicles in the lane you want to enter. Before changing lanes, you should also ensure that no drivers are attempting to drive into the same spot from a different lane.

hasPart.name: When driving on a multilane street with two-way traffic:

about.name: When driving on a multilane street with two-way traffic:

hasPart.assesses: When driving on a multilane street with two-way traffic: | When driving on a multilane street with two-way traffic: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Driving directly alongside another vehicle could create a collision if the other driver crowds your lane or tries to change lanes without looking. To avoid this, you should drive ahead of or behind vehicles in other lanes rather than alongside them.

suggestedAnswer.text: Drive alongside other vehicles so the drivers can see you.

comment.text: Drive alongside other vehicles so the drivers can see you.

suggestedAnswer.text: You should drive ahead of or behind the other vehicles.

comment.text: You should drive ahead of or behind the other vehicles.

suggestedAnswer.text: It is safest to drive in the lane next to the centerline.

comment.text: It is safest to drive in the lane next to the centerline.

acceptedAnswer.text: You should drive ahead of or behind the other vehicles.

comment.text: You should drive ahead of or behind the other vehicles.

answerExplanation.text: Driving directly alongside another vehicle could create a collision if the other driver crowds your lane or tries to change lanes without looking. To avoid this, you should drive ahead of or behind vehicles in other lanes rather than alongside them.

comment.text: When driving on a multilane street with two-way traffic: | Driving directly alongside another vehicle could create a collision if the other driver crowds your lane or tries to change lanes without looking. To avoid this, you should drive ahead of or behind vehicles in other lanes rather than alongside them.

hasPart.name: You are getting ready to make a right turn. You should:

about.name: You are getting ready to make a right turn. You should:

hasPart.assesses: You are getting ready to make a right turn. You should: | You are getting ready to make a right turn. You should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When making a right turn, you should begin signaling about 100 feet before the turn, reduce your speed, stop behind the limit line (if applicable), and then make the turn.

comment.text: Signal and turn immediately.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop before entering the right lane and let all other traffic go first.

comment.text: Stop before entering the right lane and let all other traffic go first.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down or stop, if necessary, and then make the turn.

comment.text: Slow down or stop, if necessary, and then make the turn.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down or stop, if necessary, and then make the turn.

comment.text: Slow down or stop, if necessary, and then make the turn.

answerExplanation.text: When making a right turn, you should begin signaling about 100 feet before the turn, reduce your speed, stop behind the limit line (if applicable), and then make the turn.

comment.text: You are getting ready to make a right turn. You should: | When making a right turn, you should begin signaling about 100 feet before the turn, reduce your speed, stop behind the limit line (if applicable), and then make the turn.
